fields.name: CreateAbstractAuthorSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: The author was successfully added to this abstract.

value.stringValue: Does the abstract have another author?
Yes, I want to add more authors

fields.name: CreateAbstractSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText:
A draft of your abstract has been successfully created!

If you need to make changes to your abstract, you can do this later as well.


Following files have been addd to your abstract:

{!Image_1_Location}: {!Image1Name}

{!Image_2_Location}: {!Image2Name}

{!Image_3_Location}: {!Image3Name}


Now, please add at least one author to your abstract.

Please do not add more than 25 authors.

fields.name: AuthorNotFoundDisplay
fields.fieldText: ﻿If you cannot find the author in the search, please create a new author by entering the email here:

fields.name: PresenterNotFoundDisplay
fields.fieldText: If you cannot find the presenter in the search, please create a new presenter by entering the email here:

fields.name: DraftSuccessDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Your draft has been saved.

All abstracts drafts can be seen and edited in the community.


Please remember to submit your abstract before the deadline {!GetEvent.Abstract_Submission_Deadline__c}

fields.name: ConfirmationDisplay
fields.fieldText:
It is required to confirm the authors consent, originality and copyright of the abstract before submitting it.

﻿

By checking following boxes, ...

fields.name: AuthorConsentCheckbox
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have the consent of the authors to submit this abstract

validationRule.errorMessage: This checkbox has to be selected.

fields.name: OriginalityCheckbox
fields.fieldText: I confirm the originality of this abstract

validationRule.errorMessage: This checkbox has to be selected.

fields.name: CopyrightCheckbox
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I hold the copyright for this abstract

validationRule.errorMessage: This checkbox has to be selected.

fields.name: SubmissionSuccessDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your abstract submission!

You can see the status of your submitted abstract in the community.
